original_title: The Virgin Queen of St. Francis High
overview: With $2,000 at stake, timid teen Mike (Joseph R. Straface) gambles with the school jock over who will be the first to sleep with the most beautiful and chaste girl at St. Francis High, Diane (Stacy Christensen). While trying to lure Diane back to his place for a weekend of carnal encounters, Mike genuinely falls for the beauty queen, becoming unsure if his original heartless pursuit is worth losing what could become a real relationship.
title: The Virgin Queen of St. Francis High
